sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from "react"; import { UserOutlined } from "@ant-design/icons"; import { useForm, Controller } from "react-hook-form"; import { Input } from "antd"; import { MainContainer, FirstConatiner, SecContainer, HeadingSection, TextSection, RightConatiner, LeftContainer, FirstRightConatiner, InputSection, MidSection, TipSection, LastSection, LastInputSection, LeftDarkContainer, TopTextDetails, MidTextDetails, TextInRow, BottomText, FirstText, SecTextForDetails, ButonContainer, BottomTextSection, SPlTextSection, SelectTipContainer, ButtonText, } from "../../styles/views/splitter"; export const SplitterView = () => { const [tip, setTip] = useState([ { percentage: "5%", isCustom: false, isClick: false }, { percentage: "10%", isCustom: false, isClick: false }, { percentage: "15%", isCustom: false, isClick: false }, { percentage: "25%", isCustom: false, isClick: false }, { percentage: "50%", isCustom: false, isClick: false }, { percentage: "Custom", isCustom: false, isClick: false }, ]); const handleTipClick = (clickedPercentage) => { const updatedTip = tip.map((item) => ({ ...item, isClick: item.percentage === clickedPercentage, isCustom: item.percentage === "Custom" && item.percentage === clickedPercentage, })); setTip(updatedTip); }; return (

Tip Amount per Person: ${tipAmountPerPerson.toFixed(2)}

Total Amount per Person: ${totalAmountPerPerson.toFixed(2)}

Results:

Tip per person: ${calculateTip().tipPerPerson.toFixed(2)}

Total per person: ${calculateTip().totalPerPerson.toFixed(2)}

SPLT TTER Bill setBillAmount(e.target.value)} /> Select Tip % {tip.map((item) => (
handleTipClick(item.percentage)} isClick={item.isClick} isCustomBackground={item.isCustom} > {item.isCustom === true ? ( setCustomTipAmount(e.target.value)} /> ) : ( item.percentage )}
))} Number of People setNumberOfPeople(e.target.value)} prefix={} /> Tip Amount /Person $0.0 Total /Person $0.0 Reset ); };
